body: No that's not how you read ntr, you're just completely ignoring it by pretending it's vanilla... just go read vanilla. Also this isn't even ntr ffs, it's not so hard to write this from the guy's perspective so why not.

This is how you read Netorare 
1. The first normal looking dude ignore everything he says and think of him as the bad guy. 
2. The moment you see an ugly bastard or buff tan dude you think of him as the main girls childhood friend and his appearance is due to a curse. 
3. Ignore all dialog and focus on the action. 
4. Ignore any conversion between guy 1 and the girl and guy 2. 
5. The two main characters live happily without any abuse nor cheating and everyone live long life's full of love.
@harmonygirl23 Godzilla had a stroke after reading this and died.
now this is what I call "worthy investment"
Well I guess Yuu-kun will abandon you so be happy with the old man for as long as you can..lol
